description: Integración Social Comunidades Afrodescendientes en América Latina y el Caribe.

subproject.description: This project is framed within Democratic Governance’s focus area 2, which is aimed at the promotion and participation of vulnerable groups, such as Afrodescendant population. In this context, the purpose of this ID is to build and develop the capacities of Afrodescendant organizations in the area of communication and, at the same time, increase the amount and quality of knowledge on this population group, including their rights and exercise of those rights.
subproject.title: Cap Org Afros y Redes Fortalec

subproject.description: Within the framework of Democratic Governance’s focus area 2, this project enhances citizenship of the Afro-Latin American population and strengthens their organizations by means of the systematization of knowledge related to social inclusion. With a view to increase equity and reduce discrimination, it is of great importance to disseminate the contributions of Afro population in Latin America and to create awareness among public opinion on the issue. Dialogue will be fostered to promote inclusive participation of Afro citizens and organizations in Colombia, Ecuador and Panama.
subproject.title: Ciudadanía ampliada y conocim.

title: Proyecto Reg Población Afrodescendiente - América Latina
